import {AiOutlineLeft,AiOutlineRight} from "react-icons/ai"; import {FaQuoteLeft,FaQuoteRight} from "react-icons/fa" function Testimonial({currPos,setCurPos,length,setTestimonial,testimonial}){ function LeftSliderHandler(){ let id = currPos; id = (-1)*(id-1)%length; setCurPos(id); console.log(currPos); } return(
{testimonial.name}
{testimonial.job}

{testimonial.text}

); } export default Testimonial;
